briefTitle: Open Label Study to Evaluate Long Term Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of Repeated Dosing in Subjects With Crohn's Disease and Who Participated and Successfully Completed M14-115
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-Label Study to Evaluate the Long Term Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of Repeated Administration of Adalimumab in Subjects With Crohn's Disease
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the long term efficacy, safety, and tolerability of repeated administration of adalimumab in participants with Crohn's disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Endoscopic Improvement at Week 40 in Participants With Endoscopic Improvement at Week 0
